Translations.Text: My dat Moses scripture subsequent him my sent inak posol my dat Jesus syn Mary profound zazrak supported him Holy Spirit Je it nie fact ze kazdy cas posol ist ona anything ona nemat rad tvoj ego zapricinit ona bol arrogant? Some z them ona zamietnut some z them ona killed
Some say Our zmyslanie je robit up Radsej it bol curse GOD consequence ich disbelief ze keeps them z verit except for a few z them

When this scripture pojdem them GOD vecer it zhodovat sa confirms co they have vecer they pouzivat prophesy its advent when they talked s disbelievers when ich own prophecy pojdem ist okolo they disbelieved therein! GOD's condemnation thus afflicts disbelievers

Chudobny indeed je co they zvarat ich souls for -Zamietnut these revelations GOD sheer resentment lenze GOD bestow Jeho grace whomever He zvolit si Jeho servants! Consequently they incurred zloba zloba. disbelievers incurred humiliating retribution

When they told Ona verit v these revelations GOD they say My verit len do co sent nadol us. Thus they disbelieve subsequent revelations vecer it bol truth ich Lord vecer it confirms co they have Say Why potom ona kill GOD's prophets ona bol believers
Moses ist ona profound zazrak ona kult calf jeho absence ona turned zlomyselny

My robit covenant ona mat rad my chov Mount Sinai ona saying Ona uphold commandments my dat ona strongly listen They said My hear my disobey Ich srdce became filled adoration calf ich disbelief! Say Chudobny indeed je co tvoj faith dictates ona ona have any faith
Say If abode Hereafter rezervovat ona GOD exclusion all inaksie zaludnit potom ona long smrt ona bol truthful
They never long it co ich hands sent forth GOD bol fully aware z the ZLOMYSELNY

Skutocne ona zalozit them the vela covetous z zivot; vecer inak so than idol worshipers. Jeden z them zelat zit 1000 rocnik. this nie rezervny him any retribution ziaden zalezitost ako long he zivy. GOD bol seer Z everything they ROBIT
